title: Installation issue: cereal (patch fails for versions <= 1.2.2)
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install cereal@1.2.2 # or any anterior version
...
==> Installing cereal-1.2.2-e46l73hcbk37p54ilxtystq3ergv326x
==> No binary for cereal-1.2.2-e46l73hcbk37p54ilxtystq3ergv326x found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/archive/19/1921f26d2e1daf9132da3c432e2fd02093ecaedf846e65d7679ddf868c7289c4.tar.gz
###################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Applied patch /projects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cereal/Boost.patch
==> Applied patch /projects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cereal/Boost2.patch
==> Applied patch /projects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cereal/pointers.patch
1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to file include/cereal/details/static_object.hpp.rej
==> Patch /projects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cereal/LockGuard-default-ctor.patch failed.
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/patch' '-s' '-p' '1' '-i' '/projects/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cereal/LockGuard-default-ctor.patch' '-d' '.'
```

The latest version (1.3.0) installs fine. None of the earlier versions do (at least I tried 1.2.2, 1.2.0, and 0.9.1, and all fail with a patch error).

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-2956-f8794afcbd
* **Python:** 3.9.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu21.04-sandybridge
* **Concretizer:** original 

This problem appeared on multiple machines, it's not specific to my particular installation here.

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
